Articles.Content:
Hi,

Just want to share my excitement about KSP. Did not know of its existence since a couple of days. For me its the best game i purchased since 2012!!

The learning curve is quit steep for new people but YT is full with tutorial vids that are very helpfull to bring a spaceship into orbit. In my first attempt i shot a kerbal right into the dark, deep space going nowhere. Poor guy (or girl).

Hopefully there will be some apps in the future to use my Ipad mini for cockpit view or as instrument panel.

Great job so far!! Keep on doing the great work!
Hello Mr. or Ms. Polar-eX. Welcome to the game, and the forum. (I moved your thread to the welcome section, where greetings like this are extended. )

Welcome to

... I mean, KSP!

Remember that half the fun of this game is finding out how you're going to fail. I've left many a Kerbal flying through the universe or stranded in a bad place. XD

Welcome.

You do however have a faulty mindset. Allow me to correct that:

That Kerbal out in deep space is not a poor guy. Instead, he's a hero, exploring deep space. Just rewrite the mission goals, and call it a succes.

O and the most important rule: As long as the capsule survives, it's a succesfull landing
